entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 20 April 2023
